titleStmt.title: Epithalamium Gallo-Britannicum or, Great-Britaines, Frances, and the most parts of Europes vnspeakable ioy, for the most happy vnion, and blessed contract of the high and mighty Prince Charles, Prince of Wales, and the Lady Henrette Maria, daughter to Henry the fourth, sirnamed the Great, late King of the French and Nauarre, and sister to Levvis the thirteenth: now king of the said dominions. Manifesting the royall ancestors and famous progenitors of the mighty Prince Charles, and the most illustrious princesse, the Lady Henrette, explaining the sweete interchanges of mariages, as haue beene betweene France and Great Britaine. ...
titleStmt.author: Marcelline, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Thomas Archer, and are to be sold in Popes Head-Alley, ouer against the signe of the Horse-shooe,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Popes Head-Alley, ouer against the signe of the Horse-shooe
